name: amantadine hydrochloride
indications: amantadine hydrochloride capsules , usp indicated prophylaxis treatment signs symptoms infection caused various strains influenza virus . amantadine hydrochloride capsules , usp also indicated treatment parkinsonism drug-induced extrapyramidal .
contraindications: dose amantadine hydrochloride capsules may need reduction patients congestive heart failure , peripheral edema , orthostatic hypotension , impaired renal function ( impaired renal function ) .
warningsAndPrecautions: amantadine hydrochloride capsules , usp 100 mg soft gelatin capsule , opaque yellow oblong shape , imprinted “ p19 ” black ink . capsules free surface stickiness leaking . fill materials practically off-white light yellow suspension supplied follows : ndc 42806-716-11 bottles 10 capsules ndc 42806-716-05 bottles 500 capsules store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense tight , light-resistant container defined usp .
adverseReactions: amantadine hydrochloride capsules , usp contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity amantadine hydrochloride ingredients amantadine hydrochloride capsules , usp .
indications_original: Amantadine hydrochloride capsules, USP are indicated for the prophylaxis and treatment of signs and symptoms of infection caused by various strains of influenza A virus. Amantadine hydrochloride capsules, USP are also indicated in the treatment of parkinsonism and drug-induced extrapyramidal reactions.
contraindications_original: The dose of amantadine hydrochloride capsules may need reduction in patients with congestive heart failure, peripheral edema, orthostatic hypotension, or impaired renal function (see Dosage for Impaired Renal Function).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Amantadine hydrochloride capsules, USP 100 mg are soft gelatin capsule, opaque yellow oblong shape, which is imprinted with “P19” in Black ink. Capsules are free of surface stickiness and leaking. The fill materials are practically off-white to light yellow suspension and supplied as follows:
                  NDC 42806-716-11 bottles of 10 capsules
                  NDC 42806-716-05 bottles of 500 capsules
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in the USP.
adverseReactions_original: Amantadine hydrochloride capsules, USP are contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to amantadine hydrochloride or to any of the other ingredients in amantadine hydrochloride capsules, USP.
